### I'm Lauren, and I've been a frontend engineer for over 10 years.<br> I currently work at [RevenueCat](https://www.revenuecat.com/).

[<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/linkedin-2b6ad3?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64," alt="LinkedIn"/>](https://www.linkedin.com/in/lauren-burdock/) [<img alt="Static Badge" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/website-2b6ad3?style=for-the-badge&logo=htmx">](https://lburdock.github.io/)


#### Skills
Frontend:
> TypeScript, React, Redux, RTK Query, Apollo Client, Material UI, Tailwind CSS, Next.js (SSR), Visx, Storybook, Jest, React Testing Library, Playwright

Backend:
> Node.js, Express, Socket.io, MongoDB, Python, Flask

#### Projects for RevenueCat

* [Paywalls](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xSc9ICeyJpk) — Remotely configurable paywalls that let developers design and update paywalls in their mobile subscription apps without deploying code changes.
* [Targeting](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NLNp_q7_RAQ) — Allows developers to deliver tailored paywalls by segmenting users based on factors like location and mobile platform.
* [Custom Attributes](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sFv5YtWhVas) — Expands the targeting feature by adding user segmentation based on custom subscriber attributes set by the developer.

#### Projects for fun

* [Color Dashboard](https://lburdock.github.io/color-dashboard/accessibility) — A color utility dashboard that tests accessibility and suggests color variations to meet requirements.
* [JS Test Cheatsheet](https://neighborly-stoplight-336.notion.site/JS-test-1bab0052709a80638352e99e9a8b71ca) — A cheat sheet for writing tests with Vitest and React Testing Library.
* [Icebreakers](https://lburdock.github.io/icebreakers/) — A progressive web app for icebreaker questions.
